name: io.github.fyrsmithlabs/contextd
title: ContextD
description: Cross-session memory, checkpoints, and error remediation for AI agents. Supports tool search with defer_loading for context optimization (~80% reduction). Uses semantic search over past learnings to provide relevant context.

io.github.fyrsmithlabs/toolSearch.description: Server implements tool_search MCP tool for dynamic tool discovery. Tools marked with defer_loading: true are loaded on-demand via tool search.
io.github.fyrsmithlabs/toolSearch.contextSavings: ~80% reduction in initial tool definition tokens
